name: The Weather Rainbowed Canvas
text:
"The Weather" Effect Monsters in your Main Monster Zones of this card's column and its adjacent columns gain this effect.
‚óè If your opponent control a monster: you can banish this card (Quick Effect); Special Summon 1 "The Weather" monster with a different name than this card from your Deck, also you cannot Special Summon monster from your Deck for the rest of this turn.
You can only control 1 "The Weather Rainbowy Canvas".
